title: sneaky

description.plain:
The smooth-riding “sneaky” showcases 21 Savage’s ability to create a catchy trap hit. In the track, Savage flaunts his “sneaky links” and dismisses their potential partners whose wealth pale in comparison. He gauges his wealth by emphasizing weekly multi-thousand-dollar Chanel purchases for his ladies.

The boldness of “sneaky” reflects 21 Savage achieving his childhood dream of attaining wealth and notoriety—which is centered with american dream.

embed_content: Read “sneaky” by 21 Savage on Genius
